name: narraflow
description: Offline speech-to-text with hotkey activation for macOS
author: NarraFlow Team

scripts.dev: npm run copy:helper && concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy:helper
scripts.build:mac:arm64:dev: node scripts/set-env.js dev && ARCH=arm64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64:dev: node scripts/set-env.js dev && ARCH=x64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --x64
scripts.build:mac:arm64:prod: node scripts/set-env.js prod && ARCH=arm64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --arm64
scripts.build:mac:x64:prod: node scripts/set-env.js prod && ARCH=x64 electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.js --mac --x64
scripts.build:dev: npm run build && npm run build:mac:arm64:dev && npm run build:mac:x64:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run build:mac:arm64:prod && npm run build:mac:x64:prod
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run build:mac:arm64:prod && npm run publish:github
scripts.copy:helper: mkdir -p dist/fn-key-helper/build && cp -r fn-key-helper/build/NarraFlowFnHelper.app dist/fn-key-helper/build/ 2>/dev/null || true
